name: LaserDefender (Anton Zhernosek)
description:
Controls: WASD/Arrows to move, Space/LMB to shoot, E to shield, Q to use powerup, ESC to pause

! May take a bit of time to load on first start

A prototype  based on gamedevTV Laser Defender course

Expanded with a whole bunch of new features:

- Enemy variants, including a Boss enemy with AI

- Robust SFX and Music player with options to configure it

- Robust enemy spawner with 4 different modes of enemy spawning configurations as well as custom Scriptable Object variants for enemy waves

- Powerups, which do various things (damage enemies, enhance the player's shield, switch player weapons, etc.)

- Some post-processing applied only to particular layers (kinda annoying to implement in URP tbh)

- Some basic shaders and VFX for custom things

- Additional UI elements

Assets: 

Sprites and SFX by Kenney.nl

Music - Juhani Junkala Retro Game Music Pack

Fonts: Exo Space, Spaceline, Space Age

This is a personal, non-commercial product. All the used assets are authorized for personal use
